name: Easy Turkey Chili
author: aworley
summary: This chili is super quick to prepare, and is ready in less than an hour. Garnish with cheese.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat vegetable oil in a large pot over medium-high heat and stir in the ground turkey
Cook and stir until the turkey is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink
Drain and discard any excess grease
Stir in the onion; cook and stir until the onion is tender, about 5 minutes
Add the chicken broth, tomatoes, black beans, kidney beans, refried beans, garlic, chili powder, paprika, oregano, cumin, salt, and black pepper
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low
Sprinkle each bowl with a teaspoon of Cheddar cheese, if desired
